Class WaitMotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • WaitMotor

  • public class WaitMotor
extends java.lang.Object
    WaitMotor, used to wait the rotations of a motor. In the LEGO Mindstorms environment is represented by the orange block "Wait".

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WaitMotor(SingleMotor singleMotor, int comparisonValue)
      Constructor method, creates the wait by setting the motor and the comparison value.

    • Method Summary

      Set the comparison value.
      void setSingleMotor(SingleMotor singleMotor)
      Set the single motor.
      void waitMotor()
      Wait the motor rotations based on the comparison value.
